entry.tran: 泰国的;泰国人的;泰语的;泰国文化的
entry.def: Thai means belonging or relating to Thailand, or to its people, language, or culture.
A Thai is a citizen of Thailand, or a person of Thai origin.
Thai is the language spoken in Thailand.
